lemma weak_universalD[dest]: assumes "weak_universal (t:: 'x itself) R (G\<^sub>1::('a, 'b) labeled_graph) G\<^sub>2 f\<^sub>1 f\<^sub>2" shows "\<And> h\<^sub>1 h\<^sub>2 G::('a, 'x) labeled_graph. graph_homomorphism (snd R) G h\<^sub>1 \<Longrightarrow> graph_homomorphism G\<^sub>1 G h\<^sub>2 \<Longrightarrow> f\<^sub>1 O h\<^sub>2 \<subseteq> h\<^sub>1 \<Longrightarrow> (\<exists> h. graph_homomorphism G\<^sub>2 G h \<and> h\<^sub>2 \<subseteq> h)"
